emb = nn.Embedding(...) # construct embedding with desired parameters

body:
You can just replace the weights data. PyTorch is fully imperative so you can mess around with things even after construction time. Just do this:
```python
emb = nn.Embedding(...) # construct embedding with desired parameters
emb.weight = nn.Parameter(preloaded_weights)
```
